content: bob-omb is approximately 6cm tall when seated the round body is approximately 5cm in width weight 15g this includes all materials used to make bob-omb - 2mm hook - stylecraft special dk in midnight sherbet sunshine gold and white replace the midnight with matador if you want to make a red bob-omb - 10mm black safety eyes i have painted mine white with nail varnish alternatively you can use white felt + glue - toy filling - pins to place pieces before sewing together - needle - stitch markers i prefer using scrap yarn as stitch markers the pattern consists of two youtube videos - part 1 head & body sun 9 nov at 17 00gmt - part 2 the blue top & wick feet and the golden key sun 16 nov at 17 00gmt
